enb_long_title: Eighth Conference of the Parties to the UN Framework Convention on Climate Change
section_title: STATEMENTS FROM HEADS OF UNITED NATIONS AGENCIES
sentences: The World Meteorological Organization Secretary General G. O. P. Obasi called on Parties to continue supporting the systematic observation of the atmosphere and other activities to reduce scientific uncertainties.
UNEP Executive Director Klaus Töpfer noted that those in poverty will suffer most from the adverse effects of climate change.
He called for concrete action on adaptation as well as mitigation.
